text:
I'm not sure if this is an Apache bug or a compatibility issue. I recently set
up a webserver on my home pc with apache because I was so frustrated that I
couldn't find a free hosting service with Perl installed. Well my website is
running fine, except, when left running for long periods of time no one can
access it, they get a browser time out. It seems that every time this happens
all I have to do is stop and restart apache. I'm not sure if this is related to
the firewall I'm using, DNS domain service I'm using or other such things.
Please let me know, thanks!
